articles.author: Tom Perkins
articles.title: US food pesticides contaminated with toxic 'forever chemicals' testing finds - The Guardian
articles.description: PFAS are present at ‘potentially dangerous’ levels in widely used chemicals sprayed on food crops destined for Americans’ plates
articles.content:
Some of the United States most widely used food pesticides are contaminated with potentially dangerous levels of toxic PFAS forever chemicals, new testing of the products finds.
